00193 void ObjectiveFunctional::setNumericalEpsilon(double newNumericalEpsilon)
00194 {

00196 
00197    if(newNumericalEpsilon <= 0.0)
00198    {
00199       std::cerr << std::endl
00200                 << "Flood Error: ObjectiveFunction class." << std::endl
00201                 << "void setNumericalEpsilon(double) method." << std::endl
00202                 << "Numerical epsilon must be greater than 0." << std::endl
00203                 << std::endl;
00204 
00205       exit(1);
00206    }
00207 
00208    // Set numerical epsilon
00209 
00210    numericalEpsilon = newNumericalEpsilon;
00211

00292 // double calculatePotentialEvaluation(Vector<double>) method
00293 
00301 
00302 double ObjectiveFunctional::calculatePotentialEvaluation(Vector<double> potentialFreeParameters)
00303 {
00304    // Control sentence
00305 
00306    int size = potentialFreeParameters.getSize();
00307 
00308    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
00309 
00310    if(size != numberOfFreeParameters)
00311    {
00312       std::cerr << std::endl
00313                 << "Flood Error: ObjectiveFunction class." << std::endl
00314                 << "double calculatePotentialEvaluation(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
00315                 << "Size must be equal to number of free parameters." << std::endl
00316                 << std::endl;
00317 
00318       exit(1);
00319    }
00320 
00321    // Calculate potential evaluation
00322 
00323    double potentialEvaluation = 0.0;
00324 
00325    Vector<double> originalFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getFreeParameters();
00326 
00327    // Set potential parameters
00328 
00329    multilayerPerceptron->setFreeParameters(potentialFreeParameters);
00330 
00331    // Get Objective
00332 
00333    potentialEvaluation = calculateEvaluation();
00334 
00335    // Restart original free parameters
00336 
00337    multilayerPerceptron->setFreeParameters(originalFreeParameters);
00338 
00339 
00340    return(potentialEvaluation);
00341 }

00343 
00344 // double calculateGradient(void) method
00345 
00351 
00352 Vector<double> ObjectiveFunctional::calculateGradient(void)
00353 {
00354    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
00355 
00356    Vector<double> gradient(numberOfFreeParameters);
00357 
00358    Vector<double> potentialFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getFreeParameters();   
00359 
00360    double actualEpsilon = 0.0;
00361 
00362    // Numerical differentiation method
00363 
00364    switch(numericalDifferentiationMethod)   
00365    {
00366       case ForwardDifferences:
00367       {
00368          double evaluation = calculateEvaluation();
00369 
00370          double evaluationForward = 0.0;
00371 
00372          for(int i = 0; i < numberOfFreeParameters; i++)
00373          {
00374             // Numerical epsilon method
00375 
00376             switch(numericalEpsilonMethod)   
00377             {
00378                case Absolute:
00379                {
00380                   actualEpsilon = numericalEpsilon;
00381                }             
00382                break;
00383             
00384                case Relative:
00385                {
00386                   if(fabs(potentialFreeParameters[i]) < 1.0)
00387                   {
00388                      actualEpsilon = numericalEpsilon;              
00389                   }
00390                   else
00391                   {     
00392                      actualEpsilon = numericalEpsilon*fabs(potentialFreeParameters[i]);
00393                   }
00394                }                          
00395                break;           
00396 
00397                default:
00398                {
00399                   std::cerr << std::endl 
00400                             << "Flood Error: ObjectiveFunctional class." << std::endl
00401                             << "Vector<double> calculateGradient(void) method." << std::endl
00402                             << "Unknown numerical epsilon method." << std::endl
00403                             << std::endl;
00404  
00405                   exit(1);
00406                }// end default
00407                break;
00408  
00409             }// end numerical epsilon switch
00410 
00411             // Add epsilon to free parameter
00412 
00413             potentialFreeParameters[i] += actualEpsilon;
00414 
00415             // Get potential evaluation
00416 
00417             evaluationForward = calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
00418 
00419             // Restart free parameter
00420 
00421             potentialFreeParameters[i] -= actualEpsilon;
00422 
00423             // Calculate derivative
00424 
00425             gradient[i] = (evaluationForward - evaluation)/actualEpsilon;
00426          }// end for 
00427       }
00428 
00429       break;
00430 
00431       case CentralDifferences:
00432       {
00433          double evaluationForward = 0.0;
00434          double evaluationBackward = 0.0;
00435 
00436          for(int i = 0; i < numberOfFreeParameters; i++)
00437          {
00438             // Numerical epsilon method
00439 
00440             switch(numericalEpsilonMethod)   
00441             {
00442                case Absolute:
00443                {
00444                   actualEpsilon = numericalEpsilon;
00445                }             
00446                break;
00447             
00448                case Relative:
00449                {
00450                   if(fabs(potentialFreeParameters[i]) < 1.0)
00451                   {
00452                      actualEpsilon = numericalEpsilon;              
00453                   }
00454                   else
00455                   {     
00456                      actualEpsilon = numericalEpsilon*fabs(potentialFreeParameters[i]);
00457                   }
00458                }                            
00459                break;           
00460 
00461                default:
00462                {
00463                   std::cerr << std::endl 
00464                             << "Flood Error: ObjectiveFunctional class." << std::endl
00465                             << "Vector<double> calculateGradient(void) method." << std::endl
00466                             << "Unknown numerical epsilon method." << std::endl
00467                             << std::endl;
00468  
00469                   exit(1);
00470                }// end default
00471                break;
00472  
00473             }// end numerical epsilon method switch
00474 
00475             // Add epsilon to free parameter
00476 
00477             potentialFreeParameters[i] += actualEpsilon;
00478 
00479             // Get potential evaluation
00480 
00481             evaluationForward = calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
00482 
00483             // Restart free parameter
00484 
00485             potentialFreeParameters[i] -= actualEpsilon;
00486 
00487             // Substract epsilon from free parameter
00488 
00489             potentialFreeParameters[i] -= actualEpsilon;
00490 
00491             // Get potential evaluation
00492 
00493             evaluationBackward = calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
00494 
00495             // Restart free parameter
00496 
00497             potentialFreeParameters[i] += actualEpsilon;
00498 
00499             // Calculate derivative
00500 
00501             gradient[i] = (evaluationForward - evaluationBackward)/(2.0*actualEpsilon);
00502          }// end for
00503       }
00504 
00505       break;
00506    }// end numerical differentiation method switch
00507 
00508 
00509    return(gradient);
00510 }

00513 // Vector<double> calculatePotentialGradient(Vector<double>) method
00514 
00524 
00525 Vector<double> ObjectiveFunctional::calculatePotentialGradient(Vector<double> potentialFreeParameters)
00526 {
00527    // Control sentence
00528 
00529    int size = potentialFreeParameters.getSize();
00530 
00531    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
00532 
00533    if(size != numberOfFreeParameters)
00534    {
00535       std::cerr << std::endl
00536                 << "Flood Error: ObjectiveFunction class." << std::endl
00537                 << "double calculatePotentialGradient(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
00538                 << "Size must be equal to number of free parameters." << std::endl
00539                 << std::endl;
00540 
00541       exit(1);
00542    }
00543 
00544    // Calculate potential gradient
00545 
00546    Vector<double> originalFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getFreeParameters();
00547 
00548    Vector<double> potentialGradient(numberOfFreeParameters);
00549 
00550    // Set potential parameters
00551 
00552    multilayerPerceptron->setFreeParameters(potentialFreeParameters);
00553 
00554    // Get Objective function gradient
00555 
00556    potentialGradient = calculateGradient();
00557 
00558    // Restart original free parameters
00559 
00560    multilayerPerceptron->setFreeParameters(originalFreeParameters);
00561 
00562    return(potentialGradient);
00563 }

00565 
00566 // Matrix<double> calculateHessian(void) method
00567 
00573 
00574 Matrix<double> ObjectiveFunctional::calculateHessian(void)
00575 {
00576    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
00577 
00578    Vector<double> potentialFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getFreeParameters();
00579 
00580    Matrix<double> hessian(numberOfFreeParameters, numberOfFreeParameters);
00581 
00582    double actualEpsilonI = 0.0;
00583    double actualEpsilonJ = 0.0;
00584 
00585    switch(numericalDifferentiationMethod)   
00586    {
00587       case ForwardDifferences:
00588       {                      
00589          std::cerr << std::endl
00590                    << "Flood Error: ObjectiveFunction class." << std::endl
00591                    << "Matrix<double> calculateHessian(void) method." << std::endl
00592                    << "Numerical differentiation of Hessian matrix with forward differences is not yet implemented." 
00593                    << std::endl
00594                    << "Please use central differences." << std::endl
00595                    << std::endl;
00596 
00597          exit(1);
00598       }
00599 
00600       break;
00601                                      
00602       case CentralDifferences:
00603       {
00604          double evaluationBackwardBackward = 0.0; 
00605          double evaluationBackwardForward = 0.0;
00606          double evaluationForwardBackward = 0.0; 
00607          double evaluationForwardForward = 0.0;
00608 
00609          // Obtain the upper part of the Hessian matrix
00610 
00611          for(int i = 0; i < numberOfFreeParameters; i++)
00612          {
00613             for(int j = i; j < numberOfFreeParameters; j++)
00614             {
00615                // Numerical epsilon method
00616   
00617                switch(numericalEpsilonMethod)   
00618                {
00619                   case Absolute:
00620                   {
00621                      actualEpsilonI = numericalEpsilon;
00622                      actualEpsilonJ = numericalEpsilon;
00623                   } 
00624             
00625                   break;
00626             
00627                   case Relative:
00628                   {
00629                      // Obtain epsilon for free parameter i
00630                       
00631                      if(fabs(potentialFreeParameters[i]) < 1.0)
00632                      {
00633                         actualEpsilonI = numericalEpsilon;                   
00634                      }
00635                      else
00636                      {
00637                         actualEpsilonI = numericalEpsilon*fabs(potentialFreeParameters[i]);                
00638                      }
00639 
00640                      // Obtain epsilon for free parameter j
00641 
00642                      if(potentialFreeParameters[j] < 1.0)
00643                      {
00644                         actualEpsilonJ = numericalEpsilon;                   
00645                      }
00646                      else
00647                      {
00648                         actualEpsilonJ = numericalEpsilon*fabs(potentialFreeParameters[j]);                
00649                      }
00650                   }                
00651             
00652                   break;            
00653                }
00654              
00655                // Perturb potential free parameters i and j
00656 
00657                potentialFreeParameters[i] += actualEpsilonI;
00658                potentialFreeParameters[j] += actualEpsilonJ;
00659 
00660                // Calculate evaluation
00661 
00662                evaluationForwardForward = calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
00663 
00664                // Restart potential free parameters i and j
00665 
00666                potentialFreeParameters[i] -= actualEpsilonI;
00667                potentialFreeParameters[j] -= actualEpsilonJ;
00668 
00669                // Perturb potential free parameters i and j
00670 
00671                potentialFreeParameters[i] += actualEpsilonI;
00672                potentialFreeParameters[j] -= actualEpsilonJ;
00673 
00674                // Calculate evaluation
00675 
00676                evaluationForwardBackward = calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
00677 
00678                // Restart potential free parameters i and j
00679 
00680                potentialFreeParameters[i] -= actualEpsilonI;
00681                potentialFreeParameters[j] += actualEpsilonJ;
00682 
00683                // Perturb potential free parameters i and j
00684 
00685                potentialFreeParameters[i] -= actualEpsilonI;
00686                potentialFreeParameters[j] += actualEpsilonJ;
00687 
00688                // Calculate evaluation
00689 
00690                evaluationBackwardForward = calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
00691 
00692                // Restart potential free parameters i and j
00693 
00694                potentialFreeParameters[i] += actualEpsilonI;
00695                potentialFreeParameters[j] -= actualEpsilonJ;
00696 
00697                // Perturb potential free parameters i and j
00698 
00699                potentialFreeParameters[i] -= actualEpsilonI;
00700                potentialFreeParameters[j] -= actualEpsilonJ;
00701 
00702                // Calculate evaluation
00703 
00704                evaluationBackwardBackward = calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
00705 
00706                // Restart potential free parameters i and j
00707 
00708                potentialFreeParameters[i] += actualEpsilonI;
00709                potentialFreeParameters[j] += actualEpsilonJ;
00710 
00711                // Calculate second derivative
00712 
00713                hessian[i][j] = (evaluationForwardForward - evaluationForwardBackward 
00714                               - evaluationBackwardForward + evaluationBackwardBackward)
00715                               /(4.0*pow(numericalEpsilon,2));
00716             }
00717          }
00718       }
00719 
00720       break;
00721    }// end numerical differentiation method switch
00722 
00723    // Obtain the rest of elements by symmetry
00724 
00725    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfFreeParameters; i++)
00726    {
00727       for(int j = 0; j < i; j++)
00728       {
00729          hessian[i][j] = hessian[j][i];
00730       }
00731    }
00732 
00733    return(hessian);
00734 }
00735 
00736 
00737 // Vector<double> calculatePotentialHessian(Vector<double>) method
00738 //
00748 
00749 Matrix<double> ObjectiveFunctional::calculatePotentialHessian(Vector<double> potentialFreeParameters)
00750 {
00751    // Control sentence
00752 
00753    int size = potentialFreeParameters.getSize();
00754 
00755    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
00756 
00757    if(size != numberOfFreeParameters)
00758    {
00759       std::cerr << std::endl
00760                 << "Flood Error: ObjectiveFunction class." << std::endl
00761                 << "double calculatePotentialHessian(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
00762                 << "Size must be equal to number of free parameters." << std::endl
00763                 << std::endl;
00764 
00765       exit(1);
00766    }
00767 
00768    // Calculate potential Hessian
00769 
00770    Vector<double> originalFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getFreeParameters();
00771 
00772    Matrix<double> potentialHessian(numberOfFreeParameters, numberOfFreeParameters);
00773 
00774    // Set potential parameters
00775 
00776    multilayerPerceptron->setFreeParameters(potentialFreeParameters);
00777 
00778    // Get objective function Hessian
00779 
00780    potentialHessian = calculateHessian();
00781 
00782    // Restart original free parameters
00783 
00784    multilayerPerceptron->setFreeParameters(originalFreeParameters);
00785 
00786    return(potentialHessian);
00787 }
00788 
00789 
00790 // Matrix<double> calculateInverseHessian(void) method
00791 
00794 
00795 Matrix<double> ObjectiveFunctional::calculateInverseHessian(void)
00796 {  
00797    Matrix<double> hessian = calculateHessian();
00798    
00799    Matrix<double> inverseHessian = hessian.calculateInverse();
00800       
00801    return(inverseHessian);               
00802 }
00803 
00804 
00805 // Matrix<double> calculateDFPInverseHessianApproximation(
00806 // Vector<double>, Vector<double>, Matrix<double>,
00807 // Vector<double>, Vector<double>) method
00808 
00817 
00818 Matrix<double> ObjectiveFunctional::calculateDFPInverseHessianApproximation(
00819 Vector<double> oldFreeParameters, Vector<double> oldGradient, Matrix<double> oldInverseHessian,
00820 Vector<double> freeParameters, Vector<double> gradient)
00821 {
00822    // Control sentence
00823 
00824    int oldFreeParametersSize = oldFreeParameters.getSize();
00825    int oldGradientSize = oldGradient.getSize();
00826    int freeParametersSize = freeParameters.getSize();
00827    int gradientSize = gradient.getSize();
00828 
00829    int numberOfRows = oldInverseHessian.getNumberOfRows();
00830    int numberOfColumns = oldInverseHessian.getNumberOfColumns();
00831 
00832    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();            
00833     
00834    if(oldFreeParametersSize != numberOfFreeParameters)
00835    {
00836       std::cerr << std::endl
00837                 << "Flood Error: ObjectiveFunction class." << std::endl
00838                 << "calculateDFPInverseHessianApproximation method." << std::endl
00839                 << "Size of old free parameters vector must be equal to number of free parameters." << std::endl
00840                 << std::endl;
00841 
00842       exit(1);
00843    }
00844    else if(oldGradientSize != numberOfFreeParameters)
00845    {
00846       std::cerr << std::endl
00847                 << "Flood Error: ObjectiveFunction class." << std::endl
00848                 << "calculateDFPInverseHessianApproximation method." << std::endl
00849                 << "Size of old gradient vector must be equal to number of free parameters." << std::endl
00850                 << std::endl;
00851 
00852       exit(1);
00853    }
00854    else if(freeParametersSize != numberOfFreeParameters)
00855    {
00856       std::cerr << std::endl
00857                 << "Flood Error: ObjectiveFunction class." << std::endl
00858                 << "calculateDFPInverseHessianApproximation method." << std::endl
00859                 << "Size of free parameters vector must be equal to number of free parameters." << std::endl
00860                 << std::endl;
00861 
00862       exit(1);
00863    }
00864    else if(gradientSize != numberOfFreeParameters)
00865    {
00866       std::cerr << std::endl
00867                 << "Flood Error: ObjectiveFunction class." << std::endl
00868                 << "calculateDFPInverseHessianApproximation method." << std::endl
00869                 << "Size of gradient vector must be equal to number of free parameters." << std::endl
00870                 << std::endl;
00871 
00872       exit(1);
00873    }
00874    else if(numberOfRows != numberOfFreeParameters)
00875    {
00876       std::cerr << std::endl
00877                 << "Flood Error: ObjectiveFunction class." << std::endl
00878                 << "calculateDFPInverseHessianApproximation method." << std::endl
00879                 << "Number of rows in old inverse Hessian must be equal to number of free parameters." 
00880                 << std::endl << std::endl;
00881 
00882       exit(1);
00883    }
00884    else if(numberOfColumns != numberOfFreeParameters)
00885    {
00886       std::cerr << std::endl
00887                 << "Flood Error: ObjectiveFunction class." << std::endl
00888                 << "calculateDFPInverseHessianApproximation method." << std::endl
00889                 << "Number of columns in old inverse Hessian must be equal to number of free parameters." 
00890                 << std::endl << std::endl;
00891 
00892       exit(1);
00893    }
00894 
00895    // Calculate inverse Hessian approximation
00896 
00897    Matrix<double> inverseHessianApproximation(numberOfFreeParameters, numberOfFreeParameters);
00898    
00899    // Free parameters difference Vector
00900    
00901    Vector<double> freeParametersDifference = freeParameters - oldFreeParameters;
00902    
00903    // Gradient difference Vector
00904    
00905    Vector<double> gradientDifference = gradient - oldGradient;
00906    
00907    // Inverse Hessian approximation
00908   
00909    inverseHessianApproximation = oldInverseHessian 
00910    + (freeParametersDifference.outer(freeParametersDifference))/(freeParametersDifference.dot(gradientDifference))
00911    - (oldInverseHessian*gradientDifference).outer(oldInverseHessian*gradientDifference)/
00912    ((gradientDifference*oldInverseHessian).dot(gradientDifference));
00913 
00914    return(inverseHessianApproximation);               
00915 }
00916 
00917 
00918 // Matrix<double> calculateBFGSInverseHessianApproximation(
00919 // Vector<double>, Vector<double>, Matrix<double>,
00920 // Vector<double>, Vector<double>) method
00921 
00930 
00931 Matrix<double> ObjectiveFunctional::calculateBFGSInverseHessianApproximation(
00932 Vector<double> oldFreeParameters, Vector<double> oldGradient, Matrix<double> oldInverseHessian,
00933 Vector<double> freeParameters, Vector<double> gradient)
00934 {
00935    // Control sentence
00936 
00937    int oldFreeParametersSize = oldFreeParameters.getSize();
00938    int oldGradientSize = oldGradient.getSize();
00939    int freeParametersSize = freeParameters.getSize();
00940    int gradientSize = gradient.getSize();
00941 
00942    int numberOfRows = oldInverseHessian.getNumberOfRows();
00943    int numberOfColumns = oldInverseHessian.getNumberOfColumns();
00944 
00945    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();            
00946     
00947    if(oldFreeParametersSize != numberOfFreeParameters)
00948    {
00949       std::cerr << std::endl
00950                 << "Flood Error: ObjectiveFunction class." << std::endl
00951                 << "calculateBFGSInverseHessianApproximation method." << std::endl
00952                 << "Size of old free parameters vector must be equal to number of free parameters." << std::endl
00953                 << std::endl;
00954 
00955       exit(1);
00956    }
00957    else if(oldGradientSize != numberOfFreeParameters)
00958    {
00959       std::cerr << std::endl
00960                 << "Flood Error: ObjectiveFunction class." << std::endl
00961                 << "calculateBFGSInverseHessianApproximation method." << std::endl
00962                 << "Size of old gradient vector must be equal to number of free parameters." << std::endl
00963                 << std::endl;
00964 
00965       exit(1);
00966    }
00967    else if(freeParametersSize != numberOfFreeParameters)
00968    {
00969       std::cerr << std::endl
00970                 << "Flood Error: ObjectiveFunction class." << std::endl
00971                 << "calculateBFGSInverseHessianApproximation method." << std::endl
00972                 << "Size of free parameters vector must be equal to number of free parameters." << std::endl
00973                 << std::endl;
00974 
00975       exit(1);
00976    }
00977    else if(gradientSize != numberOfFreeParameters)
00978    {
00979       std::cerr << std::endl
00980                 << "Flood Error: ObjectiveFunction class." << std::endl
00981                 << "calculateBFGSInverseHessianApproximation method." << std::endl
00982                 << "Size of gradient vector must be equal to number of free parameters." << std::endl
00983                 << std::endl;
00984 
00985       exit(1);
00986    }
00987    else if(numberOfRows != numberOfFreeParameters)
00988    {
00989       std::cerr << std::endl
00990                 << "Flood Error: ObjectiveFunction class." << std::endl
00991                 << "calculateBFGSInverseHessianApproximation method." << std::endl
00992                 << "Number of rows in old inverse Hessian must be equal to number of free parameters." << std::endl 
00993                 << std::endl;
00994 
00995       exit(1);
00996    }
00997    else if(numberOfColumns != numberOfFreeParameters)
00998    {
00999       std::cerr << std::endl
01000                 << "Flood Error: ObjectiveFunction class." << std::endl
01001                 << "calculateBFGSInverseHessianApproximation method." << std::endl
01002                 << "Number of columns in old inverse Hessian must be equal to number of free parameters." << std::endl 
01003                 << std::endl;
01004 
01005       exit(1);
01006    }
01007 
01008    // Calculate inverse Hessian approximation
01009 
01010    Matrix<double> inverseHessianApproximation(numberOfFreeParameters, numberOfFreeParameters);
01011 
01012    // Free parameters difference Vector
01013    
01014    Vector<double> freeParametersDifference = freeParameters - oldFreeParameters;
01015    
01016    // Gradient difference Vector
01017    
01018    Vector<double> gradientDifference = gradient - oldGradient;
01019      
01020    // BGFS Vector
01021    
01022    Vector<double> bgfs = freeParametersDifference/(freeParametersDifference.dot(gradientDifference)) 
01023    - (oldInverseHessian*gradientDifference)/((gradientDifference*oldInverseHessian).dot(gradientDifference));
01024      
01025    // Inverse Hessian approximation
01026    
01027    inverseHessianApproximation = oldInverseHessian
01028    + (freeParametersDifference.outer(freeParametersDifference))/(freeParametersDifference.dot(gradientDifference)) 
01029    - ((oldInverseHessian*gradientDifference).outer((gradientDifference*oldInverseHessian))/
01030      ((gradientDifference*oldInverseHessian).dot(gradientDifference))
01031    + (bgfs.outer(bgfs))*((gradientDifference*oldInverseHessian).dot(gradientDifference)));   
01032    
01033    return(inverseHessianApproximation);               
01034 }
01035 
01036 
01037 // Vector<double> calculateVectorHessianProduct(Vector<double>) method
01038 
01044 
01045 Vector<double> ObjectiveFunctional::calculateVectorHessianProduct(Vector<double> vector)
01046 {
01047    // Control sentence
01048 
01049    int size = vector.getSize();
01050 
01051    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
01052 
01053    if(size != numberOfFreeParameters)
01054    {
01055       std::cerr << std::endl
01056                 << "Flood Error: ObjectiveFunction class." << std::endl
01057                 << "Vector<double> calculateVectorHessianProduct(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
01058                 << "Size of vector must be equal to number of free parameters." << std::endl
01059                 << std::endl;
01060 
01061       exit(1);
01062    }
01063 
01064    // Calculate vector Hessian product
01065 
01066    Vector<double> potentialFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getFreeParameters();
01067 
01068    Vector<double> vectorHessianProduct(numberOfFreeParameters);
01069 
01070    switch(numericalDifferentiationMethod)   
01071    {
01072       case ForwardDifferences:
01073       {
01074          std::cerr << std::endl
01075                    << "Flood Error: ObjectiveFunction class." << std::endl
01076                    << "Vector<double> calculateVectorHessianProduct(Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
01077                    << "Numerical differentiation of vector-Hessian matrix with forward differences is not yet "
01078                    << "implemented." << std::endl
01079                    << "Please use central differences." << std::endl
01080                    << std::endl;
01081 
01082          exit(1);
01083       }
01084 
01085       break;
01086                                      
01087       case CentralDifferences:
01088       {
01089          Vector<double> gradientForward(numberOfFreeParameters);
01090          Vector<double> gradientBackward(numberOfFreeParameters);
01091 
01092          double actualEpsilon = 0.0;
01093 
01094          for(int i = 0; i < numberOfFreeParameters; i++)
01095          {
01096             // Obtain numerical epsilon value
01097 
01098             switch(numericalEpsilonMethod)   
01099             {
01100                case Absolute:
01101                {
01102                   actualEpsilon = numericalEpsilon;
01103                } 
01104             
01105                break;
01106             
01107                case Relative:
01108                {
01109                   if(fabs(potentialFreeParameters[i]) < 1.0)
01110                   {
01111                      actualEpsilon = numericalEpsilon;              
01112                   }
01113                   else
01114                   {     
01115                      actualEpsilon = numericalEpsilon*fabs(potentialFreeParameters[i]);
01116                   }
01117                }                
01118                break;
01119             }
01120 
01121             // Add actualEpsilon*vector[i] to free parameter i
01122 
01123             potentialFreeParameters[i] += actualEpsilon*vector[i];
01124 
01125             // Calculate objective function gradient
01126 
01127             gradientForward = calculatePotentialGradient(potentialFreeParameters);
01128 
01129             // Restart free parameter i
01130 
01131             potentialFreeParameters[i] -= actualEpsilon*vector[i];
01132 
01133             // Substract numericalEpsilon*vector[i] to free parameter i
01134 
01135             potentialFreeParameters[i] -= actualEpsilon*vector[i];
01136 
01137             // Calculate objective function gradient
01138 
01139             gradientBackward = calculatePotentialGradient(potentialFreeParameters);
01140 
01141             // Restart potential free parameter i
01142 
01143             potentialFreeParameters[i] += actualEpsilon*vector[i];
01144 
01145             // Calculate the product
01146 
01147             vectorHessianProduct[i] = (gradientForward[i] - gradientBackward[i])/(2.0*actualEpsilon);
01148          }
01149       }
01150 
01151       break;
01152    }// end numerical differentiation method switch
01153 
01154    return(vectorHessianProduct);
01155 }
01156

01158 // virtual void print(void) method
01159 
01162 
01163 void ObjectiveFunctional::print(void)
01164 {
01165    // Do nothing by default
01166 }

01168 }
